data.description:
Nightmare Tag is a PvP horror experience packed full of INTENSE CHASES & JUMP SCARES! Be one of the mortal humans trying to escape the experience. Or, become the blood-hungry monster to terrify your friends! This game will have you and your friends screaming, laughing, yelling, & sweating until your headset runs out of power! 

BECOME THE NIGHTMARE: 
- Find & chase your friends before they complete the objective!
- Unique controller motion movement to run, jump, and tear humans apart!
- Track & hunt humans using your many upgradable abilities
- Eliminate all the humans to win as the monster

RUN AND HIDE FOR YOUR LIFE: 
- Join your friends as you run and hide from the monsters!
- Hide by remaining completely motionless, making you invisible to the monster
- Physical running motion allows you to sprint when you are found and need to escape!
- Your flashgun is your only weapon, use it to see where you're going and stun the monster!
- Use your scanner to locate the monster, reunite with other humans, find power-ups, and find the objective.
- Complete the objective win as the humans!

MULTIPLE GAME MODES:
- Quick Tag
- VHS Run (requires General Admission)
- Elimination (requires General Admission)
- Capture the Fruit  (requires General Admission)

PROGRESSION
- Gain XP from playing games
- 4 upgradable perks for the Entity (Monster)
- 4 upgradable perks for Antonio (Human)

GENERAL ADMISSION (IAP):
- Unlock all zones
- Unlock all game modes
- Unlock all upgradable perks
- +3000 tokens
